title: Bug 51119extras  JmxRemoteLifecycleListener does not support JAAS based authentication and authorisation
description: Bug 51119extrasJmxRemoteLifecycleListener does not support JAAS based authentication and authorisation
OB: (Also true in Tomcat 7)The JmxRemoteLifecycleListener does not support JAAS based authentication.That is, when authentication is required, it only supports file based authentication.
